abstract.t: IANA maintains the IS-IS TLV Codepoint Registry. This registrydocuments which TLVs can appear in different types of IS-IS PDUs, butdoes not document which TLVs can be found in zero Remaining LifetimeLSP (a.k.a., purges). This document extends the existing registry torecord the set of TLVs that are permissible in purges.
